title: Lappartient Loses IOC Bid, Likely to Seek 3rd Term as UCI President
content:
Multiple sources tell Velo they expect the 51-year-old Frenchman to seek re-election for a third four-year term as president of cycling's governing body.

Read the full article at Lappartient Loses IOC Bid, Likely to Seek 3rd Term as UCI President on Velo.
author: ahood
